snippet: Mitt Romney received a warm welcome at the political gathering known as CPAC, and Senator Mitch McConnell urged his party to keep up the fight against the health care law.
abstract: Mitt Romney received a warm welcome at the political gathering known as CPAC, and Senator Mitch McConnell urged his party to keep up the fight against the health care law.

headline.main: Romney's Warm Reunion, and Other CPAC Updates

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
